summary: This is an email exchange between an unnamed sender and attorney Brendan Quigley regarding scheduling for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It includes an attached court scheduling order setting jury selection for the week of November 15, 2021, and the trial start date as November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Brendan Quigley
persons.context: Partner at Baker Botts L.L.P. representing Mr. Rodgers, communicating about scheduling availability for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Rodgers
persons.context: Mr. Rodgers is the client of attorney Brendan Quigley, whose trial schedule is being coordinated around the Maxwell trial dates.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming criminal trial for which scheduling is being discussed.

connections.description: Brendan Quigley is the attorney representing Mr. Rodgers, as indicated in the email signature and scheduling discussion.

events.title: Jury Selection for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Jury selection is scheduled to occur during the week of November 15, 2021, for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Maxwell Trial Begins
events.description: The trial for Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.

keyFacts: The court issued a scheduling order for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in May 2021.
Jury selection was scheduled for the week of November 15, 2021.
The trial was set to begin on November 29, 2021.
Attorney Brendan Quigley of Baker Botts was coordinating his client Mr. Rodgers' schedule around the Maxwell trial dates.
The document is a confidential attorney email discussing trial logistics.
